title: Last-minute prep on NFL Week 15: We have sleepers, QB questions, trends to watch and more
content: Big day for Ladd McConkey? Fantasy upside for Isaiah Likely? An advantage for Drake Maye? Lofty stat predictions for Christian Watson? Let's look at Week 15.

title: 'Just getting started': Wemby, Spurs take out OKC
content: Finally whole with the return of Victor Wembanyama, the Spurs took a big step forward in showing they're title contenders in a 111-109 win over the defending champion Thunder.

title: QB Mendoza first Hoosier to win Heisman Trophy
content: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza, who guided the Hoosiers to their first No. 1 ranking and the top seed in the 12-team CFP bracket by throwing for 2,980 yards and a national-best 33 touchdown passes, won the Heisman Trophy on Saturday night.

title: Gottlieb on Brown shooting: 'We can all be better'
content: An emotional Lindsay Gottlieb said, "It doesn't need to be this way" in response to a deadly shooting at her alma mater, Brown University.

title: Source: Colts expected to start Rivers vs. Seattle
content: Philip Rivers, who came out of retirement this week to help the Colts address their void at quarterback, is expected to start Sunday against the Seahawks, a source told ESPN.

title: Sources: Kelly to D-backs on 2-year, $40M deal
content: Merrill Kelly, after being dealt by the Diamondbacks to the Rangers at the trade deadline last season, is returning to Arizona on a two-year, $40M deal, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Cena retires from wrestling after submission loss
content: Before a stunned crowd, John Cena signaled to fans that his time is finally over, tapping out on a sleeper hold from Gunther at "Saturday Night's Main Event."

title: Navy goes for it, beats Army on 4th-and-goal TD
content: Trailing 16-10, Navy went for it on fourth down and scored the winning touchdown when Blake Horvath found Eli Heidenreich in the end zone to lift the Midshipmen past Army 17-16.

title: ðŸ‘€The many shirts of John Cena's WWE career
content: Before John Cena's final match, take a look back at his legendary career through the lens of his iconic shirts.

title: Week 15 inactives: Status of Rome Odunze, Christian McCaffrey and others
content: Updated inactives and analysis based on the latest reports and official announcements leading up to kickoff.

title: John Cena takes his last bow at WWE Saturday Night's Main Event
content: After sending John Cena out on a loss, Gunther has a new 'legend killer' nickname, and young talent shines.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this season's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, redemption  chances and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Betting Vikings-Cowboys: Picks, props and DFS plays for 'Sunday Night Football'
content: Odds, game bets, prop plays, daily fantasy advice and analysis to help you bet the Vikings-Cowboys game on Sunday.

title: Untold stories of Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff
content: Goff has a toughness that belies his California cool demeanor. Four stories that explain the Lions QB, from those who know him best.

title: Arsenal must handle title pressure better if they want to lift Premier League trophy in May
content: The Gunners made their clash with Wolves far more grueling than it needed to be, which doesn't bode well for their title aspirations.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid target Man United's Dalot
content: Real Madrid are interested in a deal for Manchester United full back Diogo Dalot. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: NFL playoff picture: Updated projections, chances to make the postseason
content: We're looking ahead to how the 14-team playoff picture could line up -- and who will win divisions -- en route to Super Bowl LX.

title: Student Dies, 31 Injured As School Bus Collides With Vehicle In Haryana: Cops
content: A student died while 31 others were injured after a school bus collided with a Haryana Roadways bus amid low visibility due to foggy weather conditions in Jhajjar on Sunday, officials said.

title: Local Jewish Rabbi: First Victim Of Deadly Australia Beach Attack Identified
content: The first victim from the shooting in Sydney's Bondi Beach today has been identified as Rabbi Eli Schlanger.

title: Bihar Minister Nitin Nabin Appointed BJP's National Working President
content: Bihar Minister Nitin Nabin was on Sunday appointed as the BJP national working president and is likely to eventually succeed JP Nadda as its national president, signalling a generational shift in the ruling party.

title: "Young, Industrious": What PM Modi Said About New BJP Chief Nitin Nabin
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday congratulated Bihar Minister Nitin Nabin upon his appointment as the Bharatiya Janata Party's National Working President.

title: Found IED In Car Linked To Sydney Beach Shooter: Australia Police
content: Australian police said an "improvised explosive device" had been found in a car linked to a suspect in a deadly shooting Sunday at Sydney's Bondi Beach.

title: Top Australian Muslim Organisation Condemns Sydney Beach Attack
content: A major Australian Muslim organisation condemned a "horrific" shooting on Sunday that killed ten people on Sydney's Bondi Beach.

title: After Deadly Australia Beach Attack, Netanyahu's "Oil On Fire" Remark
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused Australia's government of having fuelled antisemitism in the period leading up to Sunday's shooting in Sydney which targeted a Jewish celebration, killing 11 people.

title: Alleged Australia Beach Shooter's Pic Viral: What Police Chief Said
content: One of the alleged Bondi Beach shooters has been identified as Naveed Akram from Bonnyrigg, Sydney, according to a senior law enforcement official. Police raided the 24-year-old's home Sunday evening as part of the ongoing investigation, as per repor

title: Woman's Body Found In Haryana, Police Say Killed by Former Boyfriend
content: The decapitated body of a young woman has been found in Yamunanagar, Haryana. The police have arrested the accused, Furkan alias Bilal, who was her former boyfriend.

title: Sydney Bondi Beach Shooting Revives Memories Of 1996 Port Arthur Massacre
content: At least 11 people were killed after two gunmen opened fire at Sydney's Bondi Beach on Sunday during a Jewish religious gathering. One of the attackers was shot dead by police as emergency services rushed to the scene.

title: Probe Agency ED Busts Rs 2,300-Crore Crypto Scam Across Himachal, Punjab
content: The Enforcement Directorate conducted coordinated search operations at eight locations across Himachal Pradesh and Punjab on Saturday in connection with a fake cryptocurrency-based Ponzi and Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) scam.

title: "Bloodbath, Massacre": October 7 Attack Survivor Injured In Sydney Shooting
content: Among those injured in the shooting at a Jewish religious event in Australia is a man who survived the October 7 Hamas attacks in Israel and had recently shifted to Australia

title: Union Minister Of State For Finance Pankaj Chaudhary Named UP BJP Chief
content: Union Minister of State for Finance Pankaj Chaudhary was on Sunday named the new president of the BJP's Uttar Pradesh unit, with his election being formally announced by Union Minister Piyush Goyal here.

title: Australia Mass Shooting Updates: PM Modi Condemns Bondi Beach Attack That Killed 11
content: At least 12 people, including the shooter have been killed after two gunmen opened fire at Sydney's Bondi Beach on Sunday.

title: On CCTV, Scooter Rider Hits Man From Behind, Then Shoots Him In Amritsar
content: A shooting incident left two people injured and created panic at a residential area in Punjab's Amritsar. The injured people - a man and a woman - have been admitted to a hospital.

title: Alert Also In Indian Metros After Intel On Terror Attack During Hanukkah
content: A high-level alert regarding a terror attack on Jewish festival Hanukkah was recently issued in India, sources have said.

title: Aspiring Footballers Under 13 To Meet Messi During GOAT Tour's Mumbai Leg
content: The second leg of Lionel Messi's GOAT Tour will see the footballer visit Mumbai and showcase Project Mahadeva, an effort to promote the sport across the state at the grassroots level.

title: 11 Killed In Mass Shooting At Australia's Bondi Beach During Jewish Festival
content: At least 10 people were shot dead after two gunmen opened fire at Sydney's Bondi Beach today. According to witnesses, around 50 shots were fired during the shooting that took place around two hours ago.

title: Video: How An Unarmed Man Took Sydney Shooter By Surprise, Saved Lives
content: Eleven people have been killed in mass shooting that took place around two hours ago. According to eye witnesses, the two gunmen fired around 50 shots.

title: Technology Should Amplify Human Judgment, Not Replace It: Chief Justice Surya Kant
content: Chief Justice of India Surya Kant on Sunday said technology should amplify human judgment and not replace it.

title: LDF, UDF on the hunt for mayoral candidates in Kozhikode Corporation
content: The LDF will not be able to rule the Corporation without the support of at least a few councillors from either the UDF or the NDA; DCC president says UDF will put up a strong fight for the post of Mayor

title: Govt. committed to equitable development of all regions, says Excise Minister Kollu Ravindra
content: He says substantial investments are flowing into the State due to the pro-industry policies of the government

title: Veteran Congress leader Shamanur Shivashankarappa passes away at 94
content: The Karnataka Congress leader was the National president of the Akhila Bharata Veerashaiva Mahasabha and a prominent face of the Veerashaiva-Lingayat community

title: All eyes on Independent candidates in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation
content: Though BJP achieved a big win in the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, it has fallen one short of the required majority number of 51 in the council

title: Keep writing to showcase lacunae in society and record differences with majority: Jnanpith awardee Damodar Mauzo
content: Jnanpith awardee Damodar Mauzo says it is important to keep writing to showcase the lacunae in the society and to record our difference with the majority and then only an awakening was possible

title: Efftronics poised to tap emerging opportunities in diverse fields
content: Formed on December 15, 1985, ESPL is today the largest provider of data logger systems and Internet of Things (IoT)-based solutions to the Railways, and has up to 70 products in other fields

title: Post-poll LDF leadership meeting to analyse results to plot a path back to retaining power in the 2026 Assembly polls
content: LDF will examine whether campaigns on expanded social security net and achievements in infrastructure development crowded out ruling front conversations about voter-relevant local issues, pivotal to the local body polls

title: Bommai appeals not to oppose Bedti-Varada river linking project based on misconceptions
content: MP and Former Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai has appealed to activists and seers not to oppose the Bedti and Varada river linking project based on misconceptions as the project has been revised to ensure better utilisation of water

title: Actor assault case: court questions SITâ€™s omission of woman whom Suni contacted as witness
content: Court finds that SIT did not cite Sreelakshmi, whom the convict Pulsar Suni contacted and messaged while he was travelling with the survivor on the fateful day.

title: Tiruchi district remains one of the top tourist destinations in  T.N.
content: Tiruchi district occupied top slot by attracting 23.09 lakh tourists in August while Madurai, which drew 21.65 tourists, remains a top draw with foreign travellers

title: Neglect of SW hostel students will not be tolerated, says Minister Savitha
content: She directs officials to provide best medical treatment to the two students of SC hostel injured in road accident in Sri Sathya Sai district

title: Deadline for completing new integrated terminal at Vijayawada airport pushed to March 31
content: Commissioning of the new terminal is likely to take two more months; currently, over 80% of the terminal has been completed, including glass work, interiors, flooring and baggage strip

title: Bondi beach mass shooting: Video captures people fleeing to nearby cafÃ© for cover - watch
content: Tragedy struck Sydney's Bondi Beach as two suspected shooters opened fire, claiming nine lives and injuring eleven. Panic erupted as beachgoers fled the popular tourist spot. One assailant was killed, the other critically wounded. The attack occurred near a Hanukkah celebration, prompting condemnation from Israeli President Isaac Herzog as a "cruel attack on Jews."

title: Pink tax, safety tax, health tax & more: The 'hidden cost' of being a woman no one counts
content: Do women end up paying hidden taxes just to survive? From the 'pink tax' to 'safety tax' and more, where women pay more for gendered products and essential safety measures. Does simply existing as a woman become financially and emotionally more expensive, a burden society continues to overlook but hard to escape.

title: BJP gets new chief: Bihar minister Nitin Nabin appointed working president
content: Nitin Nabin has been appointed as the new national working president of the Bharatiya Janata Party, succeeding JP Nadda. A PWD minister in Bihar and MLA from Patna's Bankipur constituency, Nabin's political journey began in student politics with the ABVP. He has established himself as a key urban and infrastructure leader since entering electoral politics in the late 2000s.

title: Sydney: Bondi Beach shooting toll rises to 12; one gunman killed, other critical
content: A horrific shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach has claimed at least 12 lives, with authorities labeling it a terrorist incident. Police responded to the developing situation, urging the public to avoid the area. The attack occurred during a Hanukkah celebration, prompting condemnation and calls to combat antisemitism.

title: AI models: Oracle founder lists 2 types, says Muskâ€™s Tesla uses â€˜low-latencyâ€™
content: Oracle founder Larry Ellison distinguished between two AI model types: those requiring real-time, low-latency decisions for applications like self-driving cars and robotics, and those where delays are acceptable, such as chatbots. He highlighted Tesla's use of local compute for immediate responses, emphasizing that both categories are crucial for AI's future.

title: GOAT India Tour: Lionel Messi, Sachin share No. 10 moment; Chhetri leads football fiesta
content: Lionel Messi's hour-long visit to Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium during his GOAT India Tour 2025 was a resounding success, delighting fans and dignitaries alike. He shared a memorable moment with cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar, presented with a signed jersey. The event also saw the launch of Project Maha-deva to support young footballers.

title: South's 'Ayodhya' moment? Why Karthigai deepam row matters beyond Tamil Nadu
content: Thiruparankundram, a hill in Tamil Nadu with a history of religious coexistence, is now a flashpoint for political and legal battles. A dispute over lighting a sacred lamp during the Karthigai deepam festival has escalated, pitting the DMK against the BJP and raising questions about judicial authority and communal harmony.

title: BJP's surprise pick for president: Why Nitin Nabin matters
content: The BJP has appointed Bihar minister Nitin Nabin as its youngest Working National President, highlighting a strategic shift towards experienced, quiet strategists. Nabin's appointment underscores the party's focus on organizational strength and cadre management, particularly with a renewed emphasis on eastern India. This move signals a commitment to loyalty and effective execution in national politics.

title: Microsoft pay row: 8th-largest shareholder questions Nadellaâ€™s raise; blames board
content: Norway's $2 trillion Sovereign Wealth Fund voted against Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's compensation package and his role as board chair. The fund cited concerns over executive pay transparency and the separation of CEO and chair roles. Despite the fund's opposition, Microsoft's board approved Nadella's increased compensation, citing AI progress.

title: 3rd T20I: Record! Pandya becomes first Indian to achieve this feat
content: Hardik Pandya achieved a remarkable T20I milestone, becoming the first Indian to claim 100 wickets and score over 1,000 runs in the format. This historic feat was accomplished during the recent India vs. South Africa match. Pandya's all-round prowess continues to shine, adding his name to an elite global list of cricketers.

title: Sydney terror attack: IED found in car linked to Bondi Beach shooting; probe widens
content: Sydney's Bondi Beach was rocked by a terrorist attack during Hanukkah festivities, with two gunmen killing 11 and injuring several. Authorities discovered an improvised explosive device in a vehicle linked to one of the deceased attackers. Prime Minister Albanese condemned the targeted act of hate, emphasizing it was an attack on all Australians.

title: Rohtak bodybuilder murder: 3 accused, including two brothers, arrested in Bengaluru
content: Haryana Police have apprehended three individuals from Bengaluru in connection with the murder of bodybuilder Rohit Dhankhar in Bhiwani. The arrests follow an alleged reprisal attack after Dhankhar objected to lewd comments made at a wedding. The state's Sarv Khap has issued an ultimatum to the government for action and compensation.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
content: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, receiving immediate access to essential services. This initiative offers a dignified pathway as the island nation grapples with existential threats from climate change.

title: â€˜Brought untold shameâ€™: Bengal gov fumes over Messi event chaos; urges for strict action
content: West Bengal governor CV Ananda Bose has called the chaos at Lionel Messi's event a "shame" for Kolkata and football lovers. He demanded strict accountability, including a judicial inquiry and arrests of organizers, emphasizing the need for a standard operating procedure for managing large congregations to prevent public suffering during commercialized events.

title: Sydney shooting: Bystander tackles gunman at Bondi Beach; heroic act caught on camera
content: Chaos erupted at Sydney's Bondi Beach as a gunman opened fire, killing at least 11 people. A dramatic video shows a brave bystander tackling the shooter and disarming him amidst the panic. Police have apprehended two individuals following the terrifying incident near a Hanukkah event.  The scene was one of widespread fear and immediate medical response.

title: 'Consistently reiterated position': India rebuts Dhaka's charges; denies hostile acts
content: India has firmly rejected Bangladesh's interim government's assertions, stating New Delhi consistently supports free, fair, and inclusive elections in the neighboring country. India denied allowing its territory to be used for activities hostile to Bangladesh's interests and called on Dhaka to ensure internal law and order for peaceful elections.

title: Connor McDavidâ€™s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
content: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.

title: 'Yeh constable ka ghar hai?: Dismissed UP copâ€™s house in posh Lucknow locality sparks outrage
content: A viral video of a dismissed Uttar Pradesh constable's opulent Lucknow residence has stunned social media users. Alok Pratap Singh, arrested for his alleged role in a codeine-based cough syrup smuggling network, reportedly invested in the illicit trade, earning substantial profits far exceeding his official salary. The lavish home has ignited debate on corruption within law enforcement.

title: Triple H & Stephanie McMahon net worth 2025: WWE careers & ventures
content: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. Their leadership in talent development, branding, and strategic expansion has built a strong financial foundation and continues to shape WWE's future identity and growth under TKO.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift â€˜the dreamiest friendâ€™ amid Eras Tour buzz
content: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: 'I arrived late because of my visa': Indian student on challenges of studying in Aus
content: Anvitha Reddy's journey to Monash University in Australia involved extensive applications and a challenging start due to a visa delay. She adapted to a flexible academic system, balancing studies with a part-time digital marketing role and managing living costs through student accommodation. Building a social circle took time, but she found connections through her accommodation and university activities.

title: 'Thereâ€™s no need forâ€¦': Former India coach sends clear message to Shubman Gill
content: Former India batter Sanjay Bangar urged Shubman Gill to focus on stability and proper cricketing shots at the top of the order, rather than big hits. Bangar believes Gill's role is to see off the new ball and absorb pressure, laying the platform for explosive hitters. This advice follows Gill's recent struggles in the T20I series against South Africa.

title: BJP gets new national prez: Who is Nitin Nabin, the Bihar minister who replaced Nadda
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party has appointed Bihar minister Nitin Nabin as its national working president, a significant organizational shift. Nabin, a four-time MLA from Patna's Bankipur constituency, brings extensive grassroots experience and a strong organizational background to the party's national leadership.

title: Brown University shooting: Person of interest in custody; manhunt ends
content: A person of interest is in custody following a deadly shooting at Brown University that claimed two lives and injured nine. The incident, which occurred during a final exam review, triggered a massive manhunt and widespread panic across Providence. Authorities are investigating the motive behind the attack, one of the deadliest on a US campus recently.

title: 'Zero tolerance towards terrorism': PM Modi condemns 'ghastly' attack in Sydney
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar have strongly condemned the terrorist attack at Sydney's Bondi Beach, which claimed 11 lives and injured 16 others. The attack occurred during a Hanukkah celebration, and India has expressed solidarity with Australia, reiterating its zero-tolerance policy towards terrorism.

title: 'Our fight is against RSS, BJP; against gaddars indulging in vote chori': Kharge at Congress rally
content: The Congress intensified its campaign against alleged vote manipulation and electoral roll revisions with a massive rally in Delhi. Leaders like Mallikarjun Kharge and Rahul Gandhi addressed the gathering, accusing the government of stealing mandates and questioning the Election Commission's impartiality. The party claims to have collected over five crore signatures nationwide to highlight these concerns.

title: Sydney: Bondi Beach mass shooting declared 'terror incident' - top developments
content: A violent mass shooting by two gunmen at Sydney's famous Bondi Beach during a Chanukah celebration left nine people dead and several injured. One attacker was killed by police, while another was tackled by a bystander before being arrested. The attack has drawn widespread condemnation from national and international leaders.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office day 10: Ranveer, Akshaye Khanna, R Madhavan starrer crosses Rs 300 cr
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has shattered expectations, crossing the â‚¹300 crore mark in its second week. The film, directed by Aditya Dhar, opened strong and maintained impressive momentum, especially with a remarkable â‚¹53 crore collection on its second Saturday.  This massive success has left audiences and industry watchers astounded.

title: Joey Porter Sr. admits Dolphins years hurt his family and passion for football
content: Joey Porter Sr. revealed the profound impact of his time with the struggling Miami Dolphins, which contrasted sharply with his winning culture in Pittsburgh.  The constant losses deeply affected his family, turning game days into dreaded events and forcing him to re-evaluate his role as both a player and father.

title: AQI â€˜severe plusâ€™ in Delhi: CAQM suspends all outdoor sports; warns of serious health risks to kids
content: Delhi-NCR's air quality has plunged to 'severe plus', prompting the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) to halt all outdoor sports activities. This directive, aimed at protecting children's health, comes as the strictest Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) is enforced. Construction bans and truck entry restrictions are also in effect, with schools adopting hybrid learning.

title: â€˜140+ all dayâ€™: Faster and fitter Shivam Mavi ready for IPL return | Exclusive
content: After three injury-hit years away from the IPL, Shivam Mavi feels reborn. Having fixed action-related side-flexion issues, the 27-year-old has played consistently for Uttar Pradesh across formats, clocking 140+ consistently.

title: Mass shooting at Bondi Beach: Australian PM Albanese calls situation â€˜distressingâ€™
content: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese expressed shock following a mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach, where multiple fatalities were reported. Emergency services are on the scene, with eight individuals transported to hospitals. The Prime Minister is coordinating with state officials and urging those nearby to follow police instructions.

title: â€˜Difficult timesâ€™: Hamas confirms top commander Raed Saad killed in Israeli strike
content: Hamas confirmed the killing of senior leader Raed Saad and aides by Israeli forces, a day after Israel announced the operation. Saad, described as an architect of the October 7 attack and second-in-command of Hamas's armed wing, was reportedly killed in Gaza's tunnel network. This development risks further destabilizing the fragile truce.

title: Uttar Pradesh: BJP unanimously elects Pankaj Chaudhary state president; who is he?
content: Pankaj Chaudhary, Union Minister of State for Finance, has been unanimously elected as the Uttar Pradesh BJP president. A seven-time MP from Maharajganj, Chaudhary began his political career at the grassroots level. His appointment ahead of key political challenges is seen as a thoughtful decision by the party high command.

title: 'We hid in the dark': How fear & sirens took over Brown University; students narrate 'nightmare'
content: Gunshots erupted at Brown University, sending students into lockdown and triggering a massive manhunt. The attack inside an engineering building resulted in two fatalities and multiple injuries. Authorities released suspect footage, urging the public to report any information as the campus grappled with the sudden violence.

title: Jaiswal sends loud message to Gambhir after Gillâ€™s T20I struggles
content: Yashasvi Jaiswal smashed a sensational 101 off 48 balls, leading Mumbai to a remarkable four-wicket victory over Haryana in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. This dominant chase, the second-highest in tournament history, saw Jaiswal's brilliant century, supported by Sarfaraz Khan's quickfire 64, propel Mumbai to a memorable win.

title: Fact Check: Is China carrying out a massive military build-up near Arunachal Pradesh? Here's the truth behind viral claim
content: PIB has debunked viral claims of a large-scale Chinese military build-up near Arunachal Pradesh. The government's fact-checking agency clarified that the circulated video depicts a routine exercise by the PLA's 78th Group Army, unrelated to the Indian border. Citizens are urged to verify information from official sources.

title: 'Severely damaging': Domestic industry warns against 'zero-duty imports under FTAs'
content: India's domestic copper manufacturing faces severe damage from cheap imports under free trade agreements, according to the Indian Primary Copper Producers Association. The industry body urges the government to implement safeguard duties and quantitative restrictions to protect investments and prevent the erosion of the smelting and downstream manufacturing base.

title: Punjab road tragedy: Couple die as car plunges into drain amid dense fog; were heading for poll duty
content: An English teacher, Jaskaran Singh Bhullar, and his wife, Kanmaljit Kaur, tragically died in a road accident on Sunday morning. While driving to drop his wife for election duty, their car fell into a drain near Sangatpura village in Moga district. Police suspect fog as the cause of the accident, leaving the teacher fraternity in shock.

title: Four hours of waiting, over 1 lakh students in limbo, two outcomes: Why DUâ€™s exam delay hit them differently
content: Delhi Universityâ€™s semester exams descended into chaos after question papers for over 35 subjects reached centres up to four hours late, affecting more than one lakh students. While Honours students were cushioned by additional exam slots, Programme students faced rescheduling and extended uncertainty. The episode exposes how DUâ€™s exam design distributes disruption unequally.

title: Rs 200cr drug bust: Wardha MD racket mastermind ran lab 2km from police station; fixed their CCTVs
content: A computer repairman, Vaibhav Agarwal, was arrested as the mastermind of a Rs200 crore MD drug manufacturing racket in Wardha. He learned drug synthesis online and used his familiarity with police routines to operate a clandestine lab near a police station. DRI busted the unit, seizing 128kg of MD and advanced equipment.

title: When Messi mania turned messy: Chairs thrown, sofa set on fire â€” Inside the Kolkata chaos
content: Lionel Messi's brief 22-minute appearance at Salt Lake stadium ended in chaos as 60,000 disgruntled fans, unable to see the star, erupted in violence. Frustration over poor visibility and absent celebrities led to mayhem, including arson, vandalism, and a police lathi-charge, lasting over an hour.

title: D-Street outlook: What could drive the market this upcoming week? Key cues to watch
content: Indian markets navigated macroeconomic pressures and global uncertainties this week. A weakening rupee was partially offset by a US Federal Reserve rate cut and optimism around India-US trade talks. While foreign investors sold equities, domestic buying provided support. Investors will watch trade developments and key economic data for direction.

title: No relief: Organiser of Messi Kolkata event denied bail; sent to 14-day police custody
content: Football icon Lionel Messi's G.O.A.T India Tour 2025 organiser, Satadru Dutta, was arrested at Kolkata airport and sent to 14 days' police custody. The arrest followed chaos at the Salt Lake Stadium event, which was cut short, disappointing thousands of fans. Dutta denied responsibility for the disruption.

title: Mumbai tops road traffic CO2 emissions/km; Delhi & Bengaluru among nationâ€™s top 3 â€” key findings
content: Mumbai leads Indian cities in road traffic COâ‚‚ emissions per km due to high vehicle density. A new study reveals major metros like Delhi and Bengaluru also show significant NOx and CO pollution. The research, part of the CHETNA project, mapped emissions across 15 cities at a 500-meter resolution.

title: Brown University shooting: 1st visuals surface showing gunman; massive manhunt launched
content: The FBI released footage of a suspect in the Brown University shooting that killed two and injured nine. The individual, seen in black, was walking past a traffic light, though their face was not visible. Investigators are still determining how the shooter gained access to the classroom where the incident began.

title: Stop attacks on BRS workers or face retaliation: KTR to Congress
content: He along with party leaders visit the bereaved family of party worker who was killed in an attack allegedly by Congressmen recently

title: Corporators â€˜switch loyaltiesâ€™ ahead of Nellore mayoral election
content: Biggest jolt for YSRCP came on Sunday, when partyâ€™s city president Bobbala Srinivas Yadav, who was also its floor leader in the NMC, joined TDP in the presence of MLA Sridhar Reddy

title: UDFâ€™s victory in Erumely refuses to translate to power
content: The post of panchayat president has been reserved for an ST member, and no one from UDFâ€™s elected panel is from the community. However, both LDF and NDA have one ST member, making them eligible to claim the post

title: Inter-IIT sports meet kicks off at IIT-Hyderabad
content: Weeklong event witnessing the participation of about 2,500 students from the 23 IITs in various sporting disciplines

title: Kerala Congress (M) alleges misinformation campaign over â€™poor electoral performanceâ€™
content: The party had rather fared well at the just-concluded local body polls, retaining 10 of 11 sitting seats in Pala municipality, it says

title: Labour courts in limbo as new labour codes yet to be brought into force
content: Labour lawyers and activists say the absence of clear directions on the repeal of older labour laws has left adjudicatory bodies unsure of their authority

title: Technology unlocking new opportunities, continuity of policies key to Keralaâ€™s transformation: CM
content: CM says Kerala is now fully connected through optical fibre and provides high quality talent, and which together provides the most ideal destination for investment and innovation

title: Umayalpuram K. Sivaraman performs after 80 years at the venue where he made his debut
content: The Mridangam maestro is privileged to celebrate both 80 years of his illustrious musical career and his 90th birthday at the very same venue â€” the Kalahastheeswarar Temple on Madathu Theru in Kumbakonam.

title: ISRO lines up 7 launches, including uncrewed Gaganyaan mission by March 2026
content: The human-rated LVM3 will soar into the sky early next year, carrying the first uncrewed mission of India's human spaceflight Gaganyaan with a robot 'Vyommitra' onboard the crew module

title: Multi-layered security at Arun Jaitley Stadium ahead of footballer Messi's visit
content: On the traffic front, Deputy Commissioner of Police (Traffic) Nishant Gupta said the traffic police have identified three main parking areas for labelled vehicles, including P1 near Vikram Nagar.

title: CPI(M) MP objects to Rijijuâ€™s â€˜NDA familyâ€™ post featuring nominated Rajya Sabha members
content: Letter says portrayal of Sudha Murty and P.T. Usha as NDA MPs is â€œfactually incorrect and politically misleadingâ€

title: Govt. borrowings not translating into welfare benefits, says Buggana Rajendranath Reddy
content: Declining revenue receipts point to Chief Minister Chandrababu Naiduâ€™s failure in wealth creation, says the YSRCP leader

title: Budget 2026-27: CII pitches reforms to spur investment-led growth
content: Industry body seeks higher public capex, incentives for private investment, and measures to attract global capital

title: It is natural meet High Command when in Delhi: Satish Jarkiholi
content: Minister for Public Works Satish Jarkiholi has said that it was natural for the Congress leaders to meet the High Command when in Delhi but he had no information on possibility of chief minister and deputy chief minister meeting those in the party high command.

title: New Uttar Pradesh BJP chief has internal and external challenges before next Assembly battle
content: Pankaj Chaudharyâ€™s affable persona, OBC identity, Poorvanchali location, and general acceptability to both party workers and Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath are expected to address several challenges within the partyâ€™s State unit

title: Three Karnataka men arrested for murder in Sathya Sai district
content: According to the police, the accused allegedly killed a 44-year-old man following a long-standing land dispute and personal grudge stemming from an earlier humiliation

title: MP Priyanka Jarkiholi to take 15 meritorious girl students with her to watch Parliament session
content: Thanks to the initiative taken by MP of Chikkodi Priyanka Jarkiholi, fifteen meritorious girl students from various colleges in Chikkodi Educational District will fly with her to New Delhi to watch the parliament in session

title: Vijayawada MP sends 45 SHG women to NIRD-Hyderabad for skill trainning
content: The programme, jointly organised by the Kesineni Foundation and NIRD, aims to promote sustainable self-employment opportunities for women, participants will receive hands-on training in natural farming, vermicompost production, and honey processing

title: Andhra Pradesh receives National Energy Conservation Award from President Droupadi Murmu
content: The State has been adjudged the best performer in Group II for its sustained commitment to energy conservation, climate action, and institutional excellence

title: 38th Hyderabad Book Fair from December 19 to 29
content: The event will feature 365 stalls and a range of literary and cultural programmes aimed at reinforcing the social importance of reading

title: Sabarimala sees rise in footfall via forest trek paths
content: So far, 37,059 devotees have passed throgh Azuthakadav-Pamba trail. Sathram path in Vandiperiyar has recorded 64,776 arrivals

title: Kerala actor assault case: Manju Warrier says â€˜justice for survivor is still incompleteâ€™
content: Only those who committed the crime have been punished. The mind that planned and enabled this heinous act, whoever that is, still walks free, and that is terrifying, writes the actor in a social media post

title: Enforcement Directorate aims to end legacy FERA cases by early 2026
content: The criminal sections-loaded FERA of 1973 was replaced in June 2000 by the Foreign Exchange Management Act (FEMA) of 1999, a civil law

title: Two from TN held for illegally entering forest area in Annamayya district
content: Axes and saws seized from their possession, while remaining members of the group manage to escape under the cover of darkness

title: Efforts to repatriate Leiden copper plates from the Netherlands continue to face delays
content: Also known as Anaimangalam copper plates, they are a set of royal charters issued by King Rajendra Chola that describe the donation of Anaimangalam village, near Nagapattinam, by his father Rajaraja Chola to Sri Mara Vijayottunggavarman of the Srivijaya Kingdom for building a Buddhist Vihara

title: Survivor in actor rape case expresses profound disenchantment with trial court judgment
content: She says in a social media post that her fundamental rights were not protected and that the most important evidence in the caseâ€”the memory cardâ€”was found to have been illegally accessed three times while it was in court custody

title: Telangana urges Centre to enhance CMR target for 2025-26 Kharif by 18 LT
content: Minister for Civil Supplies N. Uttam Kumar Reddy writes to Union Food and Public Distribution Minister Prahlad Joshi to address issues nagging Telangana

title: Violence after local body poll result declaration: case filed against CPI(M) workers in Kannur
content: Police say CPI(M) workers unleashed violence in parts of north Kerala soon after the declaration of the election results

title: Salah's farewell? If this was his final Liverpool chapter, he delivered a fitting end
content: Mohamed Salah's side beat Brighton 2-0 in the premier league . Salah overtook Wayne Rooney to claim the record for goal contributions by a player for a single club in the era . the 33-year-old could have added more gloss to that tally if he not spurned a glorious late opportunity .

title: Sources: Tigers sign Jansen to bolster bullpen
content: the deal is pending a physical and includes a club option for 2027 . Jansen is major league baseball's active saves leader with 476 saves . the 38-year-old is two saves away from tying Hall of Famer Lee Smith for third on MLB's all-time saves list .

title: Patriots or Broncos: Breaking down the race for the AFC's No. 1 seed
content: the Denver Broncos and new England Patriots are separating from the pack in the race for the no. 1 seed . both enter this weekend with 11-2 records and are in the midst of 10-game winning streaks . payton recalls how his team was the No. 2 seed in the playoffs after the 2006 regular season .

title: College football bowl season: MVP picks for all 36 matchups
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40â€“38 with a two-point conversion and stop in quadruple overtime . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Patriots vs. Bills might be New England's biggest game since Tom Brady's finale
content: the Patriots clinch the AFC East title if they beat the Buffalo Bills on Sunday (1 p.m. ET, CBS) this is the franchise's highest-stakes game at Gillette Stadium since 2023 . the answer might vacate the answer .

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy, Chase Brown are league winners down the stretch
content: fantasy football managers must decide what to believe and what not to believe moving forward . the Titans are bad, and they have been lit up recently by Shedeur Sanders , Davis Mills and others . this week's fantasy playoffs are important .

title: Way-too-early 2026 Heisman watch: 15 players who could win the award
content: mendoza led the Hoosiers to a perfect 13-0 record and their first Big Ten title since 1967 . he beat out quarterbacks Diego Pavia (Vanderbilt) and Julian Sayin (Ohio State) and running back Jeremiyah Love (Notre Dame) to take home the trophy .
